targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
    (countIf(response_status_code >= '400') * 100.0 / count()) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
    (countIf(response_status_code >= '500') * 100.0 / count()) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
    (countIf(response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500') * 100.0 / count()) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
    countDistinct(request_uri_normalized) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
    AND response_status_code >= '400'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
    countIf(response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500') / $__interval_s as status_4xx,
    countIf(response_status_code >= '500') / $__interval_s as status_5xx
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    toUnixTimestamp(now()) * 1000 as time,
    countIf(response_status_code = '500') as error_500,
    countIf(response_status_code = '502') as error_502,
    countIf(response_status_code = '503') as error_503,
    countIf(response_status_code = '504') as error_504,
    countIf(response_status_code = '505') as error_505
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
    AND response_status_code >= '500'

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
    (countIf(response_status_code = '500') * 100.0 / count()) as error_500_rate,
    (countIf(response_status_code = '502') * 100.0 / count()) as error_502_rate,
    (countIf(response_status_code = '503') * 100.0 / count()) as error_503_rate,
    (countIf(response_status_code = '504') * 100.0 / count()) as error_504_rate
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as t, countIf(response_status_code = '500') / $__interval_s as "status_500", countIf(response_status_code = '502') / $__interval_s as "status_502", countIf(response_status_code = '503') / $__interval_s as "status_503", countIf(response_status_code = '504') / $__interval_s as "status_504" FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) AND response_status_code >= '500' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

SELECT
    request_uri_normalized as api_endpoint,
    response_status_code as status_code,
    count() as error_count,
    (count() * 100.0 / (SELECT count() FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) AND response_status_code >= '400')) as error_percentage,
    uniq(client_ip) as affected_clients
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
    AND response_status_code >= '400'
GROUP BY request_uri_normalized, response_status_code
ORDER BY count() DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
    request_uri_normalized as api_endpoint,
    response_status_code as status_code,
    count() as error_count,
    (count() * 100.0 / (SELECT count() FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) AND response_status_code >= '400')) as error_percentage,
    uniq(client_ip) as affected_clients
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
    AND response_status_code >= '400'
GROUP BY request_uri_normalized, response_status_code
ORDER BY count() DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as t, (countIf(response_status_code >= '500') * 100.0 / count()) as "status_5xx", (countIf(response_status_code BETWEEN '400' AND '499') * 100.0 / count()) as "status_4xx", (countIf(total_request_duration > $slow_threshold AND response_status_code >= '400') * 100.0 / countIf(response_status_code >= '400'))as value FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT business_unit FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_unit IS NOT NULL AND business_unit != ''
list.label: 业务系统
list.name: business_unit
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT business_unit FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_unit IS NOT NULL AND business_unit != ''

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE environment IS NOT NULL AND environment != '' AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
list.label: 环境
list.name: environment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE environment IS NOT NULL AND environment != '' AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT business_domain FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_domain IS NOT NULL AND business_domain != 'unknown'
list.label: 业务域
list.name: business_domain
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT business_domain FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_domain IS NOT NULL AND business_domain != 'unknown'

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT business_criticality FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_criticality IS NOT NULL AND business_criticality != 'unknown'
list.label: 业务优先级
list.name: business_criticality
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT business_criticality FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_criticality IS NOT NULL AND business_criticality != 'unknown'

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT platform_type FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE platform_type IS NOT NULL AND platform_type != 'unknown'
list.label: 平台类型
list.name: platform_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT platform_type FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE platform_type IS NOT NULL AND platform_type != 'unknown'

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE device_type IS NOT NULL AND device_type != 'unknown'
list.label: 设备类型
list.name: device_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE device_type IS NOT NULL AND device_type != 'unknown'

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT api_name FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE api_name IS NOT NULL AND api_name != 'unknown' AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
list.label: API名称
list.name: api_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT api_name FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE api_name IS NOT NULL AND api_name != 'unknown' AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT os_type FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE os_type != 'unknown'
list.label: 操作系统
list.name: os_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT os_type FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE os_type != 'unknown'
